body:
This represents the official release of Apicurio Studio, version 0.2.15.Final.

The following issues have been resolved in this release:

* [#434](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/pull/434) Stop context menu disappearing on macOS
* [#433](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/433) Editor: Context menu not working properly in MacOS + Firefox
* [#426](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/426) Editor: Update internal model on document change event for any component that extends TypedRow
* [#425](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/425) Cannot link to bitbucket account anymore
* [#424](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/424) UX: Update the L&F of the Path Params
* [#421](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/421) Editor: All Descriptions should allow multi line (and have a bigger input box)
* [#420](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/420) Editor: It should be possible to delete a description (aka make empty and click OK button)
* [#419](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/419) UX: Rename "Definition" to be "Data Type" in UI labels
* [#411](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/411) UX: Update the L&F of Property (of a definition)
* [#408](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/408) Document: configuring Apicurio to use local GitHub/GitLab
* [#405](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/405) UX: Update the L&F of Security Requirements
* [#404](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/404) UX: Update the L&F of Security Schemes
* [#403](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/403) Some Delete operations are being executed twice
* [#400](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/400) Exporting as YAML converts the "swagger" property value to numeric?
* [#399](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/399) Examples should always be stored as strings?
* [#398](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/398) UI: Failure when importing a document with numeric value in `swagger` property
* [#391](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/391) gitlab issue
* [#368](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/368) Feature: Provide a way to quickly create a CRUD resource
* [#365](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/365) UX: Update the L&F of the Query Params
* [#344](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/344) Change UX for Delete Properties of Schema
* [#332](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/332) buttons are covered by the table design
* [#206](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/206) Integration: Support local/self-hosted source control (GitHub, etc)
* [#90](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/90) API Editor: specify security at the Operation level
* [#80](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-studio/issues/80) API Editor: Support GFM syntax for all descriptions


For more information, please see the Apicurio Studio's official project site:

* [General Information](http://www.apicur.io/)
* [Download/Quickstart](http://www.apicur.io/download)
* [Blog](http://www.apicur.io/blog)
name: Beta 2.15
